product_name: Eagle Creek Undercover Hidden Pocket Pouch
long_description: The Eagle Creek Undercover Hidden Pocket is a simple pouch designed to be slipped onto your belt and then tucked away underneath the waistband of your pants. Soft yet durable ripstop nylon exterior, CoolMax(R) backing and soft-seam construction provide non-bulky comfort. 1 zippered compartment.
short_description: The Eagle Creek Undercover Hidden Pocket is a simple pouch designed to be slipped onto your belt and then tucked away underneath the waistband of your pants.
